job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Mission Essential HCS is seeking a Junior Software Engineer for a full-time opportunity with our client in San Diego, CA.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Participating in the full software development cycle starting from requirement identification</li><li>Performing software and API design for upcoming release features</li><li>Coding and testing of assigned release features</li><li>Leading system and subsystem integration of new release features</li><li>Assisting in software defect triage and resolution</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelors degree in computer engineering or computer science or equivalent</li><li>3 Years of experience as a software developer (design, coding, and testing) in commercial environment from requirements identification to deployment</li><li>3+ years of solid C and C++ Programming, including strong Object Oriented Design principles</li><li>Proactive candidate with excellent oral and written communication skills, and the ability to provide direction or training to other team members</li></ul><p></p>
